name: Ham Cooked
description: A savory-sweet classic, our fully cooked ham is tender, flavorful, and ready to serve — perfect for any meal or sandwich.

name: Pork Tapa
description: Bold and satisfying, our pork tapa delivers a balanced kick of salt and spice, great for silog meals or quick stir-fries.

name: Pork Bologna
description: Smooth and flavorful, this sweet and salty pork bologna is a versatile favorite for breakfast or snacks.

name: Pork Skinless White
description: Mild yet tasty, this skinless pork sausage blends salty and sweet flavors — a comforting choice for any dish.

name: Canadian Bacon
description: Lean, meaty, and richly salty, our Canadian bacon is a premium cut that's great for sandwiches, breakfast plates, or as a pizza topping.

name: Chicken Bologna
description: Made from quality chicken, this sweet and salty bologna offers a lighter option without sacrificing taste.

name: Tocino Regular
description: A Filipino favorite, our tocino is marinated in a signature sweet and salty blend — juicy, tender, and perfect with garlic rice.

name: Chicken Skinless
description: Tasty and healthier, this salty-sweet chicken sausage is a guilt-free choice for any time of day.

name: Pork Smoked Longganisa
description: Infused with a smoky twist, this sweet and salty longganisa brings a distinct depth of flavor to every bite.

name: Pork Skinless Red
description: Eye-catching and flavorful, this red skinless longganisa boasts a balanced salty-sweet profile that's well-loved by all ages.
